thread.title: 'Utley Sucks,' But Can Mets Fans Hold a Grudge as Long As Rangers Fans?
thread.title_full: 'Utley Sucks,' But Can Mets Fans Hold a Grudge as Long As Rangers Fans?

title: 'Utley Sucks,' But Can Mets Fans Hold a Grudge as Long As Rangers Fans?
text:
'Utley Sucks,' But Can Mets Fans Hold a Grudge as Long As Rangers Fans? By John Ness | October 13, 2015 3:29pm 
If you care about baseball in New York, you heard about how Chase Utley's dirty slide into Ruben Tejada . Mets fans hate him now. Can they hold on to that feeling the way New York Rangers fans do? Mets Fans Spent Much of Monday Night Calling for Chase Utley to Come Out and Face Them A video posted by Stephen Dettling (@sdettling) on Oct 12, 2015 at 7:51pm PDT 
It started from the moment his name was announced . Fans Brought Their Own Wanted Posters — George S. Wonica Jr. (@gswonica) October 13, 2015 And This Girl Clearly Won the Night on Social Media A photo posted by Daniel Parker (@thedp5000) on Oct 12, 2015 at 7:49pm PDT Seriously, Everyone Wanted to Share a Picture of Her Sign A photo posted by amytennery (@amytennery) on Oct 12, 2015 at 7:33pm PDT It Got to the Point Where Fans Repurposed the New York Rangers' Beloved “Potvin Sucks” Cheer Special edition of the time-honored Potvin Sucks! whistle with #Utley Sucks! at the end instead. @Mets #LGM #Mets #nymets — Justin Brannan (@JustinBrannan) October 13, 2015 
TBS announcers even made note of it. Even If You're Not Familiar With "Potvin Sucks," You Certainly Know the Tune Even Though Denis Potvin Retired in the 1980s, You Can Find a Rangers Fan Tweeting the Same Insult His Way Almost Any Day of the Year POTVIN SUCKSsorry force of habit — Travis DeFlumere (@travisnotweet) June 14, 2015 Mets Fans Certainly Feel the Same Way Right Now About Utley The "Utley sucks!" chants have returned with a vengeance. — Anthony DiComo (@AnthonyDiComo) October 13, 2015 And, Like Rangers Fans, They'll Make This Point Even When It's Unrelated to Anything Else UTLEY SUCKS W https://t.co/ivFFY8pboi — Eric Simon (@AmazinAvenue) October 13, 2015 
That's half the fun, apparently. Today, the "Utley Sucks" Tweets Are Still Going Strong I'm already starting to lose my voice. Maybe tonight I should chill a little with the "Utley Sucks" chants. — Courtney OConnell (@thegingerninja_) October 13, 2015 
Courtney's decision is the same as thousands of Mets fans': Is it time to move on, or time to make Utley hatred a permanent thing?
